DOC.criteria: Able give fully inform consent write Males female age > /= 50 year No significant disease drug use Absence sign dementia/cognitive impairment neuropsychological examinationsPatients brain imaging : Patient designee capable give fully inform consent write Patient fulfils DSMIV NINCDSADRA criterion probable Alzheimers disease Patient undergone physical neurological examination , ECG test routine hematological biochemical parameter prior radiotracer administration Pregnancy lactation Current unstable medical condition ( e.g . unstable angina , myocardial infarction coronary revascularization precede 12 month , cardiac failure , chronic renal failure , chronic hepatic disease , severe pulmonary disease , blood disorder , poorly control diabetes , chronic infection )
